name: 2D Platformer Final (jack1682)
description:
This is the final copy of my 2D Platformer Project

Modifications: 

  • Made instruction text 
  • Changed game title 
  • Changed level 2 to have its own unique environment 
  • Created a level 3 with its own unique environment 
  • Added level 4 boss fight
  • Made acid kill faster in every level (aside from level 1 obviously since it was the starter level)
  • Increased damage by final boss 
  • Scaled up the tough enemy to create final boss entity 
  • Changed damage range of the smart walking enemy in level 2 and level 3
  • Updated the credits button on main menu
  • Added level 3 button to level select (NOTE: did not add boss fight level to level select because it is meant to be played after completing all other levels, not before)
  • Added “you beat the game!” To next level button text on boss fight scene 
  • Added different color doors to each level
